title: Governance Inter-Agent Commitment Manifest (GICM)
description: The finalized data structure contract signed by SGS, GAX, and CRoT containing the results and context required for Atomic Execution (S11) and CRoT Attestation (S10).

proposal_id.description: Unique identifier for the state transition proposal.

p01_status.description: The final P-01 outcome certified by GAX (S8).

certified_metrics.description: Validated utility and risk data from CPES simulation (S6.7).

decision_log.description: A sequential, ordered log of all stage results (S1-S8), detailing specific veto checks (PVLM, MPAM, ADTM) and context validation (ECVM).

asset_hashes.description: Cryptographically attested hashes of the critical manifests used.

agent_signatures.description: Cryptographic proofs from the Triumvirate agents, confirming non-repudiation (S10).
